head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PELAVIN, MACK FANNE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PELAVIN, MACK FANNE

block.p: PELAVIN-Mack Fanne, age 93, of Pompano Beach, FL., formerly of Flint, Mich. and Hackensack. Died on May 18. Mother of Susan (John) Saril, David (Jane) Mack, Jeremy Mack, Peter (Carol) Mack, beloved grandmother of Steven, Diane, Alexander, Nicholas, Avram, David, Benjamin, Joshua, Melissa, Dinah, and greatgrandmother of Matthew, Rebecca, Jonathan, and Eliza. Loving companion of Irving Cohen. Contributions may be made to the Mack Foundation, 10 East 96 Street, New York, NY 10128.

PELAVIN-Mack Fanne, age 93, of Pompano Beach, FL., formerly of Flint, Mich. and Hackensack. Died on May 18. Mother of Susan (John) Saril, David (Jane) Mack, Jeremy Mack, Peter (Carol) Mack, beloved grandmother of Steven, Diane, Alexander, Nicholas, Avram, David, Benjamin, Joshua, Melissa, Dinah, and greatgrandmother of Matthew, Rebecca, Jonathan, and Eliza. Loving companion of Irving Cohen. Contributions may be made to the Mack Foundation, 10 East 96 Street, New York, NY 10128.
